version_description: -Smaller improvements and bugfixes

This update will eliminate errors that occured when redeeming vouchers.
We value your opinion. If you have feedback or suggestions regarding our apps, please send an e-mail to appfeedback@hotel.de .

- The search function has been enhanced. You can now also search for hotels that are located near sights (e.g. the Eiffel Tower).
- The display of the hotel description texts has been enhanced.
- You can now also use the app to register as corporate

Starting 2015 with a fresh look: The HOTEL INFO app now features a more modern colouring and a new logo.
At the same time, we have optimised the app for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus – and it can now also be used as universal app by iPad users.

This update includes several bugfixes.

We value your opinion. If you have feedback or suggestions regarding our apps, please send an e-mail to
appfeedback@hotel.de.

New features iPhone app:

Book even faster!
You can now save your credit card details in the Apple KeyChain. Just save them under "MY HOTEL INFO" or add the credit card after you've finalised a booking. Your credit card details will of course be

Getting in the mood for travels
We have optimised our iOS app for you - it will now start faster and provides a new inspiring image. You will be surprised!

Highlight: best location, shortest route!
You will now find a map section with a hotel

In an effort to further enhance the results for your hotel search, you as an iPhone user can now apply a detailed search with more filter options, such as Wi-Fi, parking and swimming pool.

Take note, dear iOS 7 user!

Miles & More integration: Collect bonus Miles now.

In this update we have improved the user guidance for corporate customers. In addition, we have adapted our privacy policy to the general data protection regulation starting on 25th of May 2018.

We improved our support and added new free international support hotlines for you.

Also, we improved the user interface and fixed known bugs.
Bug fixing and incremental improvements

We improved our support and added new free international support hotlines for you.

Also, we improved the user interface and fixed known bugs.
Improved the Hotel.Info account security. Added a new security feature for corporate customers.
Fixed an issue regarding the communication between the app and back-end systems
